game.suite

Class ChessStandardBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.suite.ChessBoard
      • game.suite.ChessStandardBoard

  • public class ChessStandardBoard
extends ChessBoard
    Subclass of a board. Standard version of a chess Board. Has methods for creating a standard chess board Populates it with regular chess pieces. Can be used to create a standard game of Chess.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class game.suite.ChessBoard
